attributes.action: Double "Christian Around Britains" (Christian Knock) final total.
attributes.additional_details:
We would humbly ask that the government consider in doubling the final total raised by Christian Around Britain.
Christian Nock is an ex serving soldier, walking the entire British coastline from Blackpool in an anti-clockwise direction. He set off on 08/08/2012 & it will take him at least 2-3 years to complete. Not only is he doing this epic journey to raise money for "Help for Heroes", he is sleeping rough every single night to raise awareness for the homeless.
